39 Hostess Brands, Inc. / Corporate Responsibility Report 2021-2022 / IV. Environmental
Opening Fall of 2023A New Bakery With A
Sustainability First Approach
We are investing in our future 
with the acquisition of a facility 
in Arkadelphia, Arkansas. This 
approximate 330,000 sq. ft. 
facility will be transformed into 
a bakery with a sustainability 
first approach.
Unburdened by pre-existing 
constraints, we expect that 
this facility will leverage best 
practices accumulated across 
our bakery network to become 
our most efficient and flexible 
operation. 
WE WILL HAVE A FOCUS ON 
SUSTAINABILITY DURING 
THE DESIGN PHASE OF 
THE PROJECT AND ARE 
COMMITTED TO MAKING 
THIS THE GREENEST 
HOSTESS FACILITY WE 
HAVE, WHICH SUPPORTS 
OUR ESG AGENDA.
